<title>20MSF Josh And Clay - Top Speed Golf</title>
<meta name="robots" content="index, follow, max-snippet:-1, max-image-preview:large, max-video-preview:-1" />

<meta property="og:title" content="Exclusive Interview Reveals How to Get Under "The Shallowing Line" for an Inside Swing Path and Flush Contact -- On Every Shot" />
<meta property="og:description" content="Are you tired of struggling with contact issues... Like fat shots... thin shots... or mishits — virtually every round you play? Do you battle with a slice or inconsistent ball flight — and yet nothing works? Well, as part of my Masters series — I just did an interview with Josh — one of my partners at Top Speed Golf. We discuss what top pros do (including Jon Rahm) that amateurs almost never get right:" />

yoast_head_json.og_description: Are you tired of struggling with contact issues... Like fat shots... thin shots... or mishits — virtually every round you play? Do you battle with a slice or inconsistent ball flight — and yet nothing works? Well, as part of my Masters series — I just did an interview with Josh — one of my partners at Top Speed Golf. We discuss what top pros do (including Jon Rahm) that amateurs almost never get right:
